hero.tagline: Not just a chatbot. A complete system of AI assistants working together for your business.
hero.sub: Zenvor deploys nine specialized AI assistants that handle your communication, sales pipeline, customer support, internal data, and workflows — automatically.

intro.p1: We build AI assistants that handle communication, sales, support, scheduling, and data — so your team can focus on what actually grows the business.
intro.p2: Each assistant has a defined role, a specific skill set, and a connection to your existing tools. They don't replace your team — they remove everything that shouldn't require a human.

cells.title: Talks to customers
cells.body: Across every channel, 24 hours a day, without missing a message.

cells.title: Qualifies leads
cells.body: Identifies serious buyers and hands them ready to close.

cells.title: Knows your business
cells.body: Reads your docs and policies. Gives real answers, not generic ones.

cells.title: Schedules meetings
cells.body: Books, confirms, and reminds automatically. No coordination needed.

cells.title: Connects your data
cells.body: Live sync with your CRM, databases, and operational tools.

cells.title: Automates workflows
cells.body: Moves data, triggers actions, updates records — no manual work.

cells.title: Supports your team
cells.body: Answers employee questions and guides internal processes.

cells.title: Provides insights
cells.body: Surfaces trends, opportunities, and decision-ready data.

services.sub: Each AI has a specific role. Together, they run the parts of your business that shouldn't require human attention.

items.name: Communication AI
items.desc: Talks to your customers across every channel simultaneously. Answers questions, explains your services, collects information, and guides people step by step — without any human involvement.

items.name: Sales AI
items.desc: Turns conversations into real opportunities. Identifies serious buyers, asks the right questions, and books meetings — so your team only talks to people ready to buy.

items.name: Support AI
items.desc: Handles your existing customers instantly. Answers common questions, explains processes, and provides assistance — reducing your support team's workload significantly.

items.name: Knowledge AI
items.desc: Reads and understands your internal documents, policies, and product information. Gives accurate answers based on your real business data — not generic responses.

items.name: Scheduling AI
items.desc: Manages meetings and appointments from start to finish. Checks availability, books slots, sends confirmations, and follows up with reminders. No manual coordination.

items.name: Data AI
items.desc: Connects directly to your databases and CRM systems. Retrieves and updates customer records, product data, and operational information automatically and in real time.

items.name: Automation AI
items.desc: Connects different parts of your business and runs workflows automatically. Moves data between systems, triggers actions, sends notifications — no human needed.

items.name: Internal Assistant AI
items.desc: A smart assistant for your team. Answers employee questions, helps find company information, and provides operational support.

items.name: Decision Support AI
items.desc: Shows you what's happening in your business. Analyzes conversations, identifies trends, highlights opportunities — so you always know what to act on.

steps.title: We learn your business
steps.body: We start by mapping your communication channels, team structure, customer journey, and existing tools. Every system we build is specific to how your company actually operates — not a generic template.

steps.title: We build your AI system
steps.body: We design and deploy the right combination of AI assistants for your needs. We connect them to your platforms, databases, CRM, and calendar — and train them on your real business data, documents, and processes.

steps.title: Your team gets their time back
steps.body: From day one, the system handles repetitive communication, routing, scheduling, and data tasks automatically. Your team focuses on decisions, relationships, and growth — not inbox management.

steps.title: It scales as you grow
steps.body: Add new channels, expand to new markets, integrate new tools. The system evolves with your company — no rebuilding from scratch, no new hires required for operational tasks.

about.p1: Most companies waste thousands of hours a year on work that should be automated. Answering the same questions. Moving data between systems. Manually scheduling meetings. Chasing unqualified leads.
about.p2: Zenvor eliminates that overhead entirely — and replaces it with intelligent systems that work continuously, never forget, and get smarter over time.

pillars.label: Bespoke, not templated
pillars.body: Every system is built for your specific company, data, and processes.

pillars.label: Connects to your stack
pillars.body: CRM, databases, calendar, messaging — we integrate with what you already use.

pillars.label: Immediate results
pillars.body: From day one, the system handles operational tasks automatically.

pillars.label: Grows with you
pillars.body: Add new capabilities, channels, and markets without starting over.

pillars.label: Secure by design
pillars.body: Encrypted data transfer, access controls, and compliance-ready architecture.

integrations.eyebrow: Connects to everything you already use

cta.sub: Book a 30-minute call. We'll show you exactly what this looks like for your business.

footer.desc: Enterprise AI automation platform. Nine specialized AI assistants working as one unified system for your business.
footer.tagline: Built with precision. Deployed with purpose.
